title: Food Security Kits for Northern Kenya
summary: Delivering monthly food baskets to drought-impacted families.
description: HumanityFirst Global Relief is partnering with local cooperatives to provide emergency food baskets, nutrition counseling, and livelihood training for pastoral communities facing prolonged drought.

title: Digital Learning Labs for Rural India
summary: STEM-ready classrooms with tablets and teacher training.
description: This program equips rural schools with solar-powered tablets, offline-first digital curriculum, and continuous mentorship for teachers to accelerate learning outcomes.

title: Mobile Health Clinics for the Andes
summary: Primary healthcare access via solar-powered mobile clinics.
description: Deploying nurse-led mobile clinics with telehealth connectivity to reach remote Andean villages for diagnostics, maternal care, and vaccinations.

title: Rapid Response for Monsoon Emergencies
summary: Shelter, clean water, and cash support during floods.
description: Our rapid response teams pre-position tarpaulins, water filters, and hygiene kits. We also run cash-for-work programs to help families rebuild livelihoods.

title: Community Reforestation in Indonesia
summary: Tree planting with community stewardship and biodiversity monitoring.
description: We train youth forest rangers, plant native species, and deploy sensors to track carbon capture and biodiversity recovery in peatland areas.

title: Safe Homes for Women & Children
summary: Protection services and education pathways for survivors of violence.
description: Safe shelters with psychosocial support, legal aid, and accelerated schooling for women and children seeking refuge.

title: Animal Welfare & Community Clinics
summary: Mobile vet clinics and humane education for youth.
description: Delivering vaccinations, rescue services, and humane education campaigns to reduce animal suffering and improve public health.
